Section 2.1

Example 2.2: Road safety data

Let’s first take a look at the data.

library(BayesianLearningCode)
str(accidents)
#>  Time-Series [1:192, 1:4] from 1987 to 2003: 1 1 2 1 4 5 2 2 1 5 ...
#>  - attr(*, "dimnames")=List of 2
#>   ..$ : NULL
#>   ..$ : chr [1:4] "children" "seniors" "children_exposure" "seniors_exposure"
plot(accidents[,c(1,3)], main = "Serious road accidents involving pedestrian children")

plot(accidents[,c(2,4)], main = "Serious road accidents involving pedestrian seniors")
